Package model

Class Figures

java.lang.Object
model.Toys
model.Figures
public class Figures extends Toys
This subclass represents a Figure object. It contains the basic toy attributes and the figure classification
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Figures

      public Figures(String serialNumber, String name, String brand, double price, int availabityCount, int ageAppropriate, String toyType, String classification)
      Constructor for the Figures class
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - serial number of the figure toy (unique, 10 digits that starts with either 0, or 1)
      name - name of the figure toy
      brand - brand of the figure toy
      price - price of the figure toy
      availabityCount - how many figure toys are available in inventory
      ageAppropriate - appropriate age range for the figure toy
      toyType - figure
      classification - figure classification (Action (a), Doll (d), or Historic (h))
